  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hercules Video Work Sheet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herkules Videoarbeit Blatt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille Visuelle de Travail de Hercule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Video Do Trabalho De Hercules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Video Foglio Del Lavoro Di Ercole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τηλεοπτικό φύλλο εργασίας Hercules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja Video Del Trabajo De Hércules</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This work sheet can be used as a report of the movie Hercules and to compare the Myth with the movie that the students have seen.It includes a simplified summary of the classical story of Hercules</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mythology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hercules</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Arbeit Blatt kann als Report des Films 
Herkules benutzt werden und den Mythus mit dem Film zu vergleichen, 
daß die Kursteilnehmer seen.It haben, schließt eine vereinfachte 
Zusammenfassung der klassischen Geschichte von Herkules ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette feuille de travail peut être utilisée 
comme état du film Hercule et comparer le mythe au film que les 
étudiants ont seen.It inclut un sommaire simplifié de l'histoire 
classique de Hercule</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta folha do trabalho pode ser usada como um 
relatório do filme Hercules e comparar o mito com o filme que os 
estudantes têm seen.It inclui um sumário simplificado da história 
classical de Hercules</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo foglio del lavoro può essere usato come 
rapporto del film Ercole e paragonare il mito al film 
che gli allievi hanno seen.It include un sommario semplificato della 
storia classica di Ercole</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το φύλλο εργασίας μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως 
έκθεση του κινηματογράφου Hercules και να συγκρίνει το μύθο με 
τον κινηματογράφο που οι σπουδαστές έχουν δει Περιλαμβάνει 
μια απλουστευμένη περίληψη της κλασσικής ιστορίας Hercules</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta hoja del trabajo se puede utilizar como 
informe de la película Hércules y comparar el mito con la película 
que los estudiantes tienen seen.It incluye un resumen simplificado de 
la historia clásica de Hércules</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Filme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mythologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herkules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">films</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mythologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hercule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
